title: The Haves And Have Nots (Ep 1745)
description:
You’re getting screwed. In this episode I address the ongoing war between the haves and have nots. I also discuss the attack in Brooklyn and the latest on the inflation crisis. 

News Picks:


Inflation explodes.


Elon Musk likes a tweet hinting at a motive for his refusal to join the Twitter board.


Here are five examples of the ongoing disinformation campaign at CNN.

Is the mask mandate on planes ever going to end? 


The BLM mansion story isn’t going away. 

Social media is a cancer for your kids.

Left wing lunatics in Philadelphia bring back the failed mask mandates.
